name: trust-lsp
description: truST LSP â€” IEC 61131-3 Structured Text language support

trust-lsp.server.path.description: Path to the trust-lsp server executable

trust-lsp.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VS Code and the language server

trust-lsp.diagnostics.showIecReferences.description: Append IEC 61131-3 references to diagnostic messages and link to local spec docs when available.

trust-lsp.debug.adapter.path.description: Path to the trust-debug adapter executable (leave empty to use trust-debug from PATH)

trust-lsp.debug.adapter.args.description: Arguments passed to the debug adapter

trust-lsp.debug.adapter.env.description: Environment variables for the debug adapter

trust-lsp.runtime.includeGlobs.description: Glob patterns for Structured Text sources to load in the runtime. Defaults to all Structured Text files in the workspace.

trust-lsp.runtime.excludeGlobs.description: Glob patterns of Structured Text sources to exclude from the runtime load set.

trust-lsp.runtime.mode.description: Default runtime mode for the runtime panel.

trust-lsp.runtime.controlEndpoint.description: Runtime control endpoint override for inline values (e.g. unix:///tmp/trust-debug.sock). Leave empty to rely on trust-lsp.toml.

trust-lsp.runtime.controlAuthToken.description: Optional auth token for the runtime control endpoint override.

trust-lsp.runtime.controlEndpointEnabled.description: Use the configured runtime control endpoint for inline values.

trust-lsp.runtime.inlineValuesEnabled.description: Enable inline values in the editor.

trust-lsp.runtime.ignorePragmas.description: Top-of-file pragma tokens that exclude a file from runtime loading.

trust-lsp.runtime.cli.path.description: Path to the trust-runtime CLI executable for running Structured Text tests (leave empty to use trust-runtime from PATH).

trust-lsp.hmi.pollIntervalMs.description: Polling interval for the HMI preview panel value refresh (milliseconds).

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_hover
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get hover information for a symbol in Structured Text.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns hover/documentation info for a symbol at a specific position in a Structured Text file. Use this to understand what a variable, function, or type does.

filePath.description: Absolute path or VS Code URI to the .st file

languageModelTools.name: trust_file_read
languageModelTools.userDescription: Read a Structured Text file or a range within it.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Reads file contents (optionally a range) from a Structured Text file. Use this to gather context before editing.

languageModelTools.name: trust_read_range
languageModelTools.userDescription: Read a range from a Structured Text file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Reads a specific range from a Structured Text file. Use this to fetch targeted context.

languageModelTools.name: trust_file_write
languageModelTools.userDescription: Write a full file for Structured Text.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Writes the entire file contents for a Structured Text file. Use this to create or replace a file.

save.description: Whether to save the file after writing

languageModelTools.name: trust_apply_edits
languageModelTools.userDescription: Apply text edits to a Structured Text file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Applies one or more range edits to a Structured Text file. Use this for precise in-place updates.

save.description: Whether to save the file after applying edits

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_diagnostics
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get errors and warnings in a Structured Text file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns all diagnostic messages (errors and warnings) for a Structured Text file. Use this to find problems in ST code.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_definition
languageModelTools.userDescription: Find where a symbol is defined.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns the location where a symbol (variable, function, type) is defined. Use this to navigate to declarations.

filePath.description: Absolute path or VS Code URI to the .st file

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_declaration
languageModelTools.userDescription: Find where a symbol is declared.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns the location where a symbol is declared. Use this to find the original declaration.

filePath.description: Absolute path or VS Code URI to the .st file

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_type_definition
languageModelTools.userDescription: Find the type definition for a symbol.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns the type definition location for a symbol. Use this to resolve aliases and custom types.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_implementation
languageModelTools.userDescription: Find implementations of a symbol.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns implementation locations for a symbol (for example, methods or interface implementations). Use this to jump to concrete implementations.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_references
languageModelTools.userDescription: Find references to a symbol.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns all references to a symbol in Structured Text. Use this to see all uses across files.

includeDeclaration.description: Whether to include the declaration in the results.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_completions
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get completion items at a position.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns completion items at a specific position in a Structured Text file. Use this to discover identifiers, functions, keywords, and snippets available in context.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_signature_help
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get signature help at a call site.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns signature help (parameter list and active parameter) at a given position. Use this to call functions/FBs correctly.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_document_symbols
languageModelTools.userDescription: List symbols in a Structured Text file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns document symbols for a Structured Text file, including ranges and container hierarchy. Use this to navigate the structure of a file.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_workspace_symbols
languageModelTools.userDescription: Search workspace symbols.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Searches for symbols across the workspace by name. Use this to find functions, types, variables, or FBs when you don't know where they are defined.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_rename_edits
languageModelTools.userDescription: Preview rename edits for a symbol.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns a workspace edit preview for renaming a symbol. Use this to see what would change before applying a rename.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_formatting_edits
languageModelTools.userDescription: Preview formatting edits for a file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns formatting edits for a Structured Text file without applying them. Use this to preview formatter changes.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_code_actions
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get code actions for a range.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns available code actions for a given range. Use this to apply quick fixes or refactors.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_project_info
languageModelTools.userDescription: Run the trust-lsp.projectInfo LSP command.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Executes the trust-lsp.projectInfo command via workspace/executeCommand and returns the response.

arguments.description: Optional arguments array for the command

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_inline_values
languageModelTools.userDescription: Retrieve inline values from the active debug session.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Requests inline values from the active debug session for a frame and range.

frameId.description: Stack frame id from the debug session

languageModelTools.name: trust_lsp_request
languageModelTools.userDescription: Send a raw LSP request and capture the response.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Sends a raw LSP request via the active Structured Text language client. Returns the response payload and optionally captured notifications.

captureNotifications.description: Optional list of notification methods to capture

notificationTimeoutMs.description: Optional timeout to wait for notifications in milliseconds

captureProgress.description: Whether to capture $/progress notifications and attach a workDoneToken

capturePartialResults.description: Whether to attach a partialResultToken and capture $/progress notifications

workDoneToken.description: Optional workDoneToken to attach to params

partialResultToken.description: Optional partialResultToken to attach to params

languageModelTools.name: trust_lsp_notify
languageModelTools.userDescription: Send a raw LSP notification.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Sends a raw LSP notification via the active Structured Text language client.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_semantic_tokens_full
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get full semantic tokens for a file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns full semantic token data for a Structured Text file.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_semantic_tokens_delta
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get semantic token deltas for a file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns semantic token delta data for a Structured Text file using a previous result id.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_semantic_tokens_range
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get semantic tokens for a range.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns semantic token data for a specific range in a Structured Text file.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_inlay_hints
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get inlay hints for a range.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns inlay hints for a specific range in a Structured Text file.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_linked_editing
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get linked editing ranges at a position.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns linked editing ranges for a symbol at a specific position.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_document_links
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get document links for a file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns document links for a Structured Text file.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_code_lens
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get code lenses for a file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns code lenses for a Structured Text file.

resolve.description: Whether to resolve code lens commands

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_selection_ranges
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get selection ranges for positions.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns selection ranges for one or more positions in a Structured Text file.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_on_type_formatting_edits
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get formatting edits for a typed character.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns formatting edits triggered by a specific character at a position.

languageModelTools.name: trust_call_hierarchy_prepare
languageModelTools.userDescription: Prepare a call hierarchy item at a position.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns call hierarchy items for a symbol at a position.

languageModelTools.name: trust_call_hierarchy_incoming
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get incoming calls for a call hierarchy item.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns incoming call hierarchy items for a prepared call hierarchy item.

languageModelTools.name: trust_call_hierarchy_outgoing
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get outgoing calls for a call hierarchy item.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns outgoing call hierarchy items for a prepared call hierarchy item.

languageModelTools.name: trust_type_hierarchy_prepare
languageModelTools.userDescription: Prepare a type hierarchy item at a position.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns type hierarchy items for a symbol at a position.

languageModelTools.name: trust_type_hierarchy_supertypes
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get supertypes for a type hierarchy item.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns supertypes for a prepared type hierarchy item.

languageModelTools.name: trust_type_hierarchy_subtypes
languageModelTools.userDescription: Get subtypes for a type hierarchy item.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Returns subtypes for a prepared type hierarchy item.

languageModelTools.name: trust_get_workspace_symbols_timed
languageModelTools.userDescription: Search workspace symbols with timing information.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Searches workspace symbols and returns timing metadata for the query.

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

languageModelTools.name: trust_workspace_rename_file
languageModelTools.userDescription: Rename or move a file in the workspace.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Renames or moves a file in the workspace and optionally uses a workspace edit.

oldPath.description: Absolute path to the existing file

newPath.description: Absolute path to the new file

overwrite.description: Whether to overwrite an existing file at the destination

useWorkspaceEdit.description: Whether to use a workspace edit for the rename

languageModelTools.name: trust_update_settings
languageModelTools.userDescription: Update a VS Code setting for Structured Text.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Updates a VS Code setting value and waits for diagnostics refresh.

filePath.description: Optional file path/URI to wait for diagnostics refresh; required for workspaceFolder scope

forceRefresh.description: Force a pull-diagnostics request after updating the setting

languageModelTools.name: trust_read_telemetry
languageModelTools.userDescription: Read trust-lsp telemetry or log output.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Reads trust-lsp telemetry/log data from the workspace or a specified file.

filePath.description: Optional absolute path to the telemetry or log file

limit.description: Maximum number of entries to return

tail.description: Whether to return the last N entries

languageModelTools.name: trust_debug_start
languageModelTools.userDescription: Start a Structured Text debug session.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Starts the Structured Text debugger. Optionally provide a configuration file path (must contain a CONFIGURATION entry).

filePath.description: Optional absolute path to the CONFIGURATION entry file

languageModelTools.name: trust_debug_attach
languageModelTools.userDescription: Attach the debugger to a running runtime.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Attaches the Structured Text debugger using runtime.toml (runtime.control.endpoint).

languageModelTools.name: trust_debug_reload
languageModelTools.userDescription: Hot reload an active Structured Text debug session.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Requests a hot reload for the active Structured Text debug session.

languageModelTools.name: trust_debug_open_io_panel
languageModelTools.userDescription: Open the Structured Text runtime I/O panel.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Opens the Structured Text runtime I/O panel for the active debug session.

languageModelTools.name: trust_debug_ensure_configuration
languageModelTools.userDescription: Create or select a Structured Text debug configuration entry file.
languageModelTools.modelDescription: Ensures a CONFIGURATION entry file exists and can be selected for debugging.

program.description: Path to the ST source or configuration file to debug

runtimeIncludeGlobs.description: Glob patterns for Structured Text sources to load in the runtime.

runtimeExcludeGlobs.description: Glob patterns for Structured Text sources to exclude from the runtime load set.

runtimeIgnorePragmas.description: Top-of-file pragma tokens that exclude a file from runtime loading.

runtimeRoot.description: Base folder for runtime include/exclude globs (defaults to workspace folder or entry file directory).
